name: Waste Management Conference
content: The Global Summit on Geoscience and Waste Management (GGWM 2020) invites members of the academia, scholars, and researchers to Dubai, UAE on the 24th-25th of February, 2020\. Join us as we explore the latest trends in the field of Geoscience and discuss common challenges in the areas of pollution, waste management and environment. Immerse yourself in the pool of knowledge and share your research findings with the international network
